title: Increases project size for which separate contracts on public work are required; repealer
summary: Raises the threshold total project cost dollar amount under the Wicks Law (requiring separate contracts for the plumbing, heating and HVAC components of public construction projects) requirements both within and without cities with a population of one million or more: would increase the existing threshold to $1,000,000 (outside of cities having a population in excess of one million) and $2,000,000 in cities having a population in excess of one million.
